item.title: Why Every Kurdish Business Needs a Digital Presence in 2026
item.description: The business case for Kurdish companies to invest in websites, social media, and digital marketing in 2026. Real examples from Erbil, Sulaymaniyah, and Duhok businesses that grew through digital channels.

item.title: Building Your First Website from Iraq: A Step-by-Step Guide
item.description: A complete, beginner-friendly guide to building and launching your first website from Iraq. Covers domain registration, hosting, WordPress setup, and making your site live â€” all with Iraq-specific advice.
